stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
http://tricky3.co.uk/products/product-image-zoom

Your Shopify store should be a vehicle for your products. High quality product images should be a given (if you don’t have any yet—spare no expense!) With an image zoom function, your high-resolution images can be brought right up close and personal, so your potential customers can view your products in all their glory.
We have over a dozen shops using Magic Zoom Plus™ from the guys at Magic Toolbox. Their product is very flexible and can be configured in numerous ways — check out any of the stores linked on this page in the ‘(Related) Portfolio’ to see some different implementations. All licensing is taken care of as part of our fee.
title: Product image zoom
